channel.title: Sever announcements + greeting
channel.description:
hey guys, I was wondering which file i have to edit to change the announcements that the server makes. Eg: when you log in it says "Welcome to Runescape (players name)! Eg2: "[Server]: Autologging will just get you banned" Eg3: "[Server]: Admins: (username), (username), (username)"
if anyone knows which files i have to edit that would be just awesome, thanks :D
I got the Greeting, now i just need to find the announcements, any ideas?

item.title: Sever announcements + greeting
item.dc:creator: @liquidazer liquidazer
item.description:
@liquidazer wrote:

alrite thanks ill let you kno how it goes :P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2009, 11:42:44 pm[/size][hr]success!
thank you very much for your help

Read full topic

item.title: Sever announcements + greeting
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Death locations can be found in Formulae.java

Starter locations can be found in your database ‘user_locations’

You will need to change the default x, y coords in your database.

Read full topic

@liquidazer wrote:

oh lol,
thought most people knew wat source im using cuz ive made a few posts…

Im using “demonik” was wondering which file i can edit to set the Starter / Death spawn.

item.title: Sever announcements + greeting
item.dc:creator: @liquidazer liquidazer
item.description:
@liquidazer wrote:

actually i just found out that it was the “adverts.xml” in the defs folder in extras,

but now all i need to do is find where to set the coordinates for the death spawn.
Anyone know where the file is located for that?

Read full topic
